#summary Short summary of changes for each version of compomics-utilities.
#labels Featured

----

*Changes in compomics-utilties 3.0.21 (Sept. 8. 2010):*
 * NEW FEATURE: Added methods for exporting components to different figure formats (png,
pdf, svg etc). 
 * NEW FEATURE: Added an export to PDF example to the SpectrumPanel demo.
 * NEW FEATURE: And added lots of proteomics related file filters.
 * FEATURE IMPROVEMENT: Made visual improvements to the GraphicsPanel to better support exports to high resolution figure formats. 
 * FEATURE IMPROVEMENT: Extended the isotopicDistribution demo help text. 

----

*Changes in compomics-utilties 3.0.20 (Sept. 3. 2010):*
 * NEW FEATURE: SILAC labeling added to the isotopicDistribution calculation.
 * FEATURE IMPROVEMENT: Updated the Isotopic Distribution Calculator Demo.
 * BUG FIX: Fixed a bug in the return enzyme as a string for X!Tandem method.
